original_text: Demas has left me and he has gone to Thessalonica city. He wanted to enjoy the things of this world too much. Crescens has gone to Galatia region. Titus has gone to Dalmatia region.
korean_text: 데마는 이 세상을 사랑하여 나를 버리고 데살로니가로 갔고 그레스게는 갈라디아로, 디도는 달마디아로 갔고

sentences.original_text: and he has gone to Thessalonica city
He wanted to enjoy the things of this world too much
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 이 세상의 것들을 너무 즐기고 싶어했습니다

sentences.original_text: Crescens has gone to Galatia region
Titus has gone to Dalmatia region
